Detailed Description

Base class for all geometry importers.

DzError DzGeometryImporter::read ( const QString &  filename,
const DzFileIOSettings *  options 
) [protected, virtual]

Reads the geometry from the file, then creates a node in the scene and sets the node's geometry to the geometry that was imported.

Parameters:
filename The full path of the file to import
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR if the geometry was successfully imported.

Implements DzImporter.

DzError DzGeometryImporter::readFile ( const QString &  filename,
DzShape **  shape 
) [virtual, slot]

Read the mesh from the given file into shape. Subclasses must reimplement this method to import the geometry.

Parameters:
filename The full path of the file to import
shape The shape to import the file into
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR if the geometry was successfully imported, or an error code if the import failed.
DzError DzGeometryImporter::readFile ( const QString &  filename,
DzShape **  shape,
const DzFileIOSettings *  options 
) [virtual, slot]

Reads the geometry from the file, then creates a node in the scene and sets the node's geometry to the geometry that was imported.

Parameters:
filename The full path of the file to import
shape The shape to import the file into
options The options to use while importing the file
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR if the geometry was successfully imported.
